commitMessage: @@@[CALCITE-634] Allow ORDER BY aggregate function in SELECT DISTINCT.  provided that it occurs in SELECT clause (Sean Hsuan-Yi Chu)

@@@[CALCITE-1150] Add dynamic record type and dynamic star for schema-on-read table

 * Add dynamic star column and dynamic record type. Use "**" as the dynamic star column name prefix. 
 * RelOptTableImpl.toRel() will convert a dynamicRecordType to RelRecordType. This ensures an immutable record type in sql-to-rel. 
 * Add RelDataType.isDynamicStruct().

Close apache/calcite/#228

@@@[CALCITE-3327] Simplify SqlValidatorTest and SqlParserTest by making test methods fluent

Replace 'boolean typeCoercion' parameter with fluent method 'Sql.withTypeCoercion(boolean)'.

Deprecate various checkXxx methods. For example. 
checkExp(sql.  expected) becomes expr(sql).ok();
checkExpFails(sql.  e) becomes expr(s).fails(e).

Rename SqlParserTest.exp to expr.

@@@[CALCITE-3892] Make junit test classes and methods non-public where possible

Prior to junit 5.  classes and methods had to be public. This is no
longer the case.

Some classes need to remain public because they are referenced from
elsewhere.  or if they use reflection somehow. The remaining 'public'
keyword will be informative to maintainers.
